phrases.original: Can pre-authorize disciples to become new users
phrases.translated: Can pre-authorize disciples to become new users

phrases.original: Can delegate the right to pre-authorize disciples
phrases.translated: Can delegate the right to pre-authorize disciples

phrases.original: All users must be authorized before they can use the Invites App. This is for security purposes, and it ensures that every user is a member in good standing with the International Christian Churches.
phrases.translated: All users must be authorized before they can use the Invites App. This is for security purposes, and it ensures that every user is a member in good standing with the International Christian Churches.

phrases.original: You can make the process of authorization quick (and barely noticeable) by pre-authorizing disciples, before they complete registration.
phrases.translated: You can make the process of authorization quick (and barely noticeable) by pre-authorizing disciples, before they complete registration.

phrases.original: If the person that you are pre-authorizing leads a group, or oversees multiple groups, choose this option.
phrases.translated: If the person that you are pre-authorizing leads a group, or oversees multiple groups, choose this option.

phrases.original: By delegating pre-authorization to leaders under your charge, you won't have to manually pre-authorize each person yourself. This will save you time.
phrases.translated: By delegating pre-authorization to leaders under your charge, you won't have to manually pre-authorize each person yourself. This will save you time.
